column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Today is Arbor Day and I am going to plant a tree to celebrate .
#text=My mother bought an apple tree at the plant store for me .
#text=She helped me carry it outside to plant .
#text=I had to pick the perfect spot for my tree .
#text=I decided it would look really nice over by the swing set .
#text=I picked a spot far enough away that the apples would n't fall on my swing set , though .
#text=I got a shovel and dug a really deep hole .
#text=Then my mom helped me put a little bit of fertilizer in the hole .
#text=The next thing I did was put the bottom of the tree into the hole and cover the root ball up with dirt .
#text=Finally , I took the water hose and sprayed the dirt around the bottom of the tree with water .
#text=I ca n't wait to see my new tree grow bigger and bigger !
